title: Volume rate of flow - time needed to fill pool

content.question: Which of the following is equal to the time it takes to fill the pool with water from the pipe?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator L W H, and denominator open parenthesis, pi r squared, close parenthesis, times lowercase v, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>W</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>H</mi><mtext> </mtext></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator open parenthesis, pi r squared, close parenthesis, times lowercase v, and denominator L W H, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>W</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>H</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, pi r squared, close parenthesis, times lowercase v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>v</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, pi r squared, close parenthesis, times lowercase v L W H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>L</mi><mi>W</mi><mi>H</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator L W H, and denominator open parenthesis, pi r squared, close parenthesis, times lowercase v, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>L</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>W</mi><mtext> </mtext><mi>H</mi><mtext> </mtext></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>v</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
